verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
We are a chosen people,
The royal priesthood,
A holy nation belonging to God.
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You have called us
Out of darkness to declare Your grace.
We exalt You and enthrone You,
Glorify Your name.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You have placed us
Into Zion, in the new Jerusalem.
Hundred thousand other voices
Singing to the Lamb.
